forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: New Placeholder + Option

comments.text: Hi! Here's what's new in version 171.22 (you're on [version]). Hope you enjoy. Thx Jinx!
There's the new placeholder [own person]! It always shows one's own name, creating a different view for each person looking at it.
There's a new Me - More option: Lock Legs! Toggle it on if you want your legs to be statically fixed, and only movable when in Me mode.
how do we use the placeholder thing
pls write [own person] in a text field you dragged into your creation. as soon as you type "[", it also shows auto-completion.

thread.latestCommentText: pls write [own name] in a text field you dragged into your creation. as soon as you type "[", it also shows auto-completion.
